Description: EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE• Garduate Engineering Degree• Minimum seven years of experience in project management.• Self-motivated, result oriented, pro-active individual who can work independently as individual contributor and also influence team members and customers at tactical level• Excellent organizational skills.• Emerging leadership qualities and skills to manage stakeholder relationships to project success, with transparent inclusive and collaborative approach• Problem-solving skills• Excellent written and verbal communication skills.• Excellent presentation skills to senior management audiences and client.• Ability to clearly establish and articulate objectives and expectations.• Hands on experience in dealing permits/licenses associated with Saudi Arabian laws, regulations for the project• Site construction experience is required• Complete project life cycle experience as a owner/facility operator is preferred• Familiarity with contract language and sub-contract administrationJob Details
